name: Pajamas Through Space
description:
Fight off alien monsters and dodge meteors all while in a colosseum flying through space , battling for your life in this fast paced, top down action game. This game is still being developed by 3 people, and has been for around 6 months. This isn't a finished version yet, just a proof of concept.

CONTROLS

WASDMoveEDashLeft ClickAttack

If you want to leave feedback, go to the google form here. 

If you're interested in game development, join our discord here.
